mapper.select: SELECT PHONE, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, HOSPITAL_IMG, ADDRESS, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME, MAIN_SUBJECT, HOLIDAY FROM HOSPITAL WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT PHARMACY_PHONE, PHARMACY_ID, PHARMACY_NAME, PHARMACY_IMG, ADDRESS, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME, HOLIDAY FROM PHARMACY WHERE ROWNUM <= #{num}
SELECT HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, HOSPITAL_IMG, MAIN_SUBJECT, DIRECTOR_NAME, HOLIDAY, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId}
SELECT PHARMACY_NAME, ADDRESS, PHARMACY_PHONE, PHARMACY_FAX, PHARMACY_IMG, CEO_NAME, HOLIDAY, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME FROM PHARMACY WHERE PHARMACY_ID = #{pharmacyId}
SELECT HOSPITAL_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, PHONE, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME, ADDRESS FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{word}||'%' ORDER BY HOSPITAL_NAME
SELECT PHARMACY_NAME, PHARMACY_ID, PHARMACY_PHONE, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME, ADDRESS FROM PHARMACY WHERE PHARMACY_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{word}||'%' ORDER BY PHARMACY_NAME
SELECT HOSPITAL_NAME, HOSPITAL_ID, PHONE, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME, ADDRESS FROM HOSPITAL WHERE MAIN_SUBJECT = #{mainSubject} ORDER BY HOSPITAL_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PHARMACY_SELECT (PHARMACY_SELECTNO, PHARMACY_ID, CLINIC_NO) VALUES (PHARMACY_SELECTNO_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,#{pharmacyId},#{clinicNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CLINIC_NO) FROM CLINIC WHERE PATIENT_NO = (SELECT PATIENT_NO FROM PATIENT WHERE USER_ID= #{userId} AND HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId})

SELECT COUNT(RESERVE_NO) FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_ID =#{userId} AND HOSPITAL_ID=#{hospitalId} AND RESERVE_YEAR || RESERVE_MONTH || RESERVE_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND RESERVE_TIME > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24') AND RESERVE_STATUS ='e1'

SELECT RESERVE_NO, DOCTOR_NO, RESERVE_TIME, (SELECT MIN(TIME) FROM DOCTOR_TIME WHERE DOCTOR_NO = #{doctorNo} AND ( (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '1' AND DAY = 'i7') --일요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '2' AND DAY = 'i1') --월요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '3' AND DAY = 'i2') --화요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '4' AND DAY = 'i3') --수요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '5' AND DAY = 'i4') --목요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '6' AND DAY = 'i5') --금요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '7' AND DAY = 'i6') --토요일 )) AS "DOCTOR_MINTIME", (SELECT MAX(TIME) FROM DOCTOR_TIME WHERE DOCTOR_NO = #{doctorNo} AND ( (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '1' AND DAY = 'i7') --일요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '2' AND DAY = 'i1') --월요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '3' AND DAY = 'i2') --화요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '4' AND DAY = 'i3') --수요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '5' AND DAY = 'i4') --목요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '6' AND DAY = 'i5') --금요일 OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'd') = '7' AND DAY = 'i6') --토요일 )) AS "DOCTOR_MAXTIME" FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_YEAR = '20'||SUBSTR(SYSDATE, 0, 2) AND RESERVE_MONTH = SUBSTR(SYSDATE, 4, 2) AND RESERVE_DAY =SUBSTR(SYSDATE, 7, 2) AND DOCTOR_NO = #{doctorNo} AND SUBSTR(RESERVE_TIME, 1, 2) >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24') AND (SUBSTR(RESERVE_TIME, 1, 2) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24') OR (SUBSTR(RESERVE_TIME, 1, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24') AND SUBSTR(RESERVE_TIME, 4, 2) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI'))) ORDER BY RESERVE_TIME
